com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.Color

  • public class Color
extends Object
    A class for a color that will hold R, G, B, and A values.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, opiop65, KevGlass
